value.title: Artificial intelligence can help highway departments find bats roosting under bridges
value.excerpt: Photographs and computer vision techniques using artificial intelligence are able to detect the presence of bats on bridges automatically with over 90% accuracy, according to our new study.

value.title: Managing change in AI: Don't forget about your staff's needs and abilities
value.excerpt: When change affects people in your organization, remember that you have a wealth of talent that needn't go to waste. Consider re-skilling to meet the company's needs as well as the employees'.

value.title: Responsible AI Is Every Business’s Responsibility
value.excerpt: Is AI the transformative technology destined to work wonders for humanity, from driverless cars to a cure for cancer? Or is it a genie in a bottle that, once released, could be used to manipulate or even rule humankind?

value.title: Press Release: Deepspatial Inc. Files Patent for Artificial Intelligence Driven Retail Management Software
value.excerpt: Deepspatial Inc. (CSE:DSAI) ("Deepspatial" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has filed patent application number 63244524 - Computer Implemented Method and System for Retail Management and Optimization with the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) for its proprietary methods of retail management with enhanced user experience for dynamic planning and decision making.

value.title: Three Ways AI Is Improving Assistive Technology
value.excerpt: When implemented effectively, assistive technology can improve accessibility and quality of life for all, regardless of ability.

value.title: Technology is a Double-edged Sword in the Face of Repressive Regimes | Opinion

value.title: Oracle’s new digital marketing software runs on AI
value.excerpt: Oracle has unveiled a new system that will use artificial intelligence (AI) to help businesses automate digital marketing campaigns more effectively. Experts at the database software specialist have developed the system in an attempt to grab a larger slice of the cloud-based software market from the likes of Adobe and Salesforce.

value.title: Robotics revolution in woodworking

value.title: Digital Freight Startup Transfix Going Public in SPAC Deal
value.excerpt: The blank-check merger would help Transfix, which competes with bigger rivals including Uber Freight, expand its business of connecting shippers with truckers.

value.title: 5 unexpectedly hot industries to find robotics jobs

value.title: DeepMind tells Google it has no idea how to make AI less toxic
value.excerpt: Everybody's talking about toxic AI, but nobody's doing anything about. But not for lack of trying. Just why can't AI researchers fix AI's potty mouth?

value.title: Putting the human back into the equation: Personalization and AI-driven digital banking experiences
value.excerpt: As more consumers turn to digital tools to manage their finances, banks must be proactive ini creating contextually-relevant experiences .

value.title: The next healthcare revolution will have AI at its center
value.excerpt: Human life expectancy increased from 31 years in 1900 to 72 years in 2017. Today, we are on the cusp of another healthcare revolution driven by artificial intelligence.

value.title: Use the AWS Cloud for observational life sciences studies
value.excerpt: In this post, we discuss how to use the AWS Cloud and its services to accelerate observational studies for life sciences customers. We provide a reference architecture for architects, business owners, and technology decision-makers in the life sciences industry to automate the processes in clinical studies.

value.title: Improved algorithms may be more important for AI performance than faster hardware
value.excerpt: A new MIT study finds that algorithmic improvements are more beneficial than powerful hardware in AI, at least at a certain point.

value.title: Zoomtopia: AI and Video to Power Healthcare
value.excerpt: At the recent Zoomtopia, the company spotlighted how healthcare providers are actively transitioning to telehealth, representing a significant disruption of the industry.

value.title: Amazon's AI-powered cameras reportedly punish its delivery drivers when they look at side mirrors or when other cars cut them off
value.excerpt: Amazon drivers have been punished for looking at side mirrors, adjusting the radio, and being cut off in traffic by other people, Motherboard reports.

value.title: Adobe’s New Marketing AI Let Customer Cut Ad Spend 50% While Growing Sales 10%

value.title: Locus Robotics heralds acquisition of Waypoint Robotics
value.excerpt: Locus Robotics, a leading provider of autonomous mobile robots (AMR) for fulfillment warehouses, today announced that it has acquired Waypoint Robotics, a leading provider of autonomous, omnidirectional mobile robots which can move and handle larger payloads.

value.title: Scale ML feature ingestion using Amazon SageMaker Feature Store
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker Feature Store is a purpose-built solution for machine learning (ML) feature management. It helps data science teams reuse ML features across teams and models, serves features for model predictions at scale with low latency, and train and deploy new models more quickly and effectively.
